intro: Draw a line to enclose the area and uncover the image underneath. Watch out for enemies who can catch you or cut your line!
description:
Take control of a brave little animal and uncover the adorable world hidden beneath the surface! 

As you move, you draw a line behind you—close the shape to reveal a piece of the cute picture underneath. From fluffy kittens to curious piglets, each level holds a surprise waiting to be uncovered.

Be careful! Flying foes and sneaky bugs are ready to interrupt your progress. If they hit your line before you close it, you’ll lose a life! Outsmart them with clever tricks like screen-edge teleporting and speed boosts to stay in the game!

Play solo or team up with a friend in co-op mode to uncover the hidden image together!

Features:
• Unique Levels - Complete 48 stages with 3 difficulty options each!
• Co-op Fun – Join forces with friends or family in local multiplayer!
• Tricky Enemies – Watch out for baddies that try to cut your line!
• Custom Looks – Choose your favorite from 12 playful animal avatars!
• Cute Pictures – Reveal a new animal picture in every level—can you find them all?

Draw, dodge, and discover!
